verbose_text: The adenosine kinase inhibitor ABT 702 (30 muM) significantly reversed the protective effect of 300 and 1,000 muM adenosine and inosine during COGD and following a 4 h-long re-oxygenation period.
evidence: adenosine kinase inhibitor ABT 702 (30 muM) significantly reversed the protective effect of 300 and 1,000 muM adenosine and inosine
